hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT page FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageImpl AS page WHERE page.id = :id
SELECT page FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageImpl AS page WHERE page.name = :pageName AND page.processDefinitionId is null
SELECT page FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageImpl AS page WHERE page.name = :pageName AND page.processDefinitionId = :processDefinitionId
SELECT page FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageImpl AS page WHERE page.processDefinitionId = :processDefinitionId
SELECT COUNT(page) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageImpl AS page
SELECT page FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageImpl AS page
SELECT pagecontent FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageContentImpl AS pagecontent WHERE pagecontent.id = :id
SELECT pagemapping FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.page.impl.SPageMappingImpl AS pagemapping WHERE pagemapping.key = :key
